threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2936 - No Wifi, has Bluetooth
threads.message:
C3420 looked bad and I replaced L3404 while I was there.
Q3450 measures okay.

I'm sort of just poking around hoping to stumble onto something as everything looks good.

Can anyone give any suggestions?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2936 - No Wifi, has Bluetooth
threads.message:
Yep, that sorted it.

Please mark this solved.
